text: is there a way to setup the HubSpot blog subscription - so that someone can subscribe ... but only to blogs of a certain tag? I have a client asking for this and haven't done it before...
Yes, you'd use the blog tag's RSS feed. See more here: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-blog/set-up-an-rss-to-email-blog-subscription-for-an-external-blog>
The RSS feed URL would be `<http://www.example.com/[blog-slug]/tag/[tag-slug]/rss.xml>`
Hi guys - I can't figure out which endpoint to use to get all the information on a deal and the products used in the deal. Any ideas?

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/deals/get_deal>

This will get a single deal and all associated info about it. If you need specific info on a product check out this endpoint also.

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/products/get_product_by_id>

Hi everybody! We just launched our new <http://www.made2grow.de|www.made2grow.de> and Chrome gives us a redirect loop error. Safari and Firefox are working fine. Chrome on private mode does the same, so no extension should cause the redirect loop. Any ideas? Trailing slash, http/https issue?
